## write() function

Replaces synchronously any existing tags with the given tags in the specified file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function write(tags: WriteTags, filepath: string): true | Error;
```

|  tags | [WriteTags](./node-id3.writetags.md) |  |

true \| Error
